#define OSEE_TC_CORE0_ISR_MAX_PRIO  (3U)
#define OSEE_TC_TC27X
#define OS_EE_GCC
#define OS_EE_KERNEL_OSEK
#define OS_EE_RTD_BUILD_ENV_CYGWIN

 *
 * Automatic OS options

 **************************************************************************/


#define OSMAXALLOWEDVALUE (2147483647U)
